h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Wind King
content: You should also look to the right of where the Black Wind King was standing next to the holder for his spear at the start of the battle, where you can find a small wooden table next to two bells with a box. Open it to find an **Agate Jar** — a Curio you can equip.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Wind King'.
The content is as follows:
You should also look to the right of where the Black Wind King was standing next to the holder for his spear at the start of the battle, where you can find a small wooden table next to two bells with a box. Open it to find an **Agate Jar** — a Curio you can equip.
